data.comment: The match has started.
Queretaro to take a throw-in in Guadalajara territory.
In the minute 3, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Guadalajara a goal kick.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
Uriel Antuna for Guadalajara is whistled offside.
In the minute 8, Corner awarded to Queretaro.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio Akron.
In the minute 9, In Zapopan Guadalajara's Jose Macias is caught offside.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Queretaro.
Free kick for Guadalajara in the half of Queretaro.
In the minute 12, In Zapopan, Jose Macias of Guadalajara is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Uriel Antuna of Guadalajara smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 14, Guadalajara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
In the minute 16, In Zapopan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Alfonso Luna (Queretaro) gets a yellow card.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Guadalajara throw-in in Queretaro's half.
In the minute 17, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Guadalajara just outside Queretaro's area.
Queretaro needs to be cautious. Guadalajara have an attacking throw-in.
Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
In the minute 20, Queretaro have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio Akron.
Queretaro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Guadalajara's Alexis Vega gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Zapopan.
Throw-in high up the field for Guadalajara in Zapopan.
In the minute 26, Guadalajara are in shooting range from this free kick.
Free kick Queretaro.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 29, Fernando Madrigal (Queretaro) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
Guadalajara take a 1-0 lead thanks to Jose Macias.
In the minute 32, Alexis Vega instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Queretaro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guadalajara's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Queretaro in the half of Guadalajara.
Ball safe as Guadalajara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Zapopan Queretaro attack through Fernando Madrigal. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 38, It's a goal kick for the home team in Zapopan.
Queretaro pushes forward through Kevin Ramirez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Queretaro have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 40, Guadalajara to take a throw-in in Queretaro territory.
Throw-in for Queretaro in their own half.
Queretaro drive upfield and Omar Islas gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Guadalajara defender.
In the minute 41, Guadalajara have a goal kick.
Angel Sepulveda gets his shot on target but fails to score for Queretaro.
In the minute 42, In Zapopan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Jesus Sanchez (Guadalajara) has received a first yellow card.
The match at Estadio Akron has been interrupted briefly for a check on Omar Islas, who is down injured.
Alex Diego (Queretaro) has taken off Omar Islas who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Irving Zurita is the replacement.
In the minute 45, Julian Velazquez for Queretaro gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Guadalajara at Estadio Akron.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Kevin Ramirez (Queretaro) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Queretaro.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Guadalajara.
The first-half is over at Estadio Akron.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Jose Maduena is replacing Jesus Sanchez for Guadalajara at Estadio Akron.
Can Guadalajara capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Queretaro's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
In the minute 49, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a throw-in for Queretaro, close to Guadalajara's area.
Throw-in for Queretaro close to the penalty box.
Queretaro are pushing forward but Alfonso Luna's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 49, Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Guadalajara a goal kick.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Queretaro in the half of Guadalajara.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards Guadalajara a goal kick.
Throw-in Queretaro.
In the minute 54, Can Guadalajara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Queretaro's half?
Guadalajara have a dangerous throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Zapopan.
In the minute 57, Queretaro have a goal kick.
Goal! Hugo Silveira levels the match at 1-1.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 61, Queretaro advance rapidly upfield but Eduardo Galvan Basulto blows for offside.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Guadalajara throw-in in Queretaro's half.
Daniel Cervantes (Queretaro) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 64, Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
Queretaro push forward at Estadio Akron and Daniel Cervantes gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Guadalajara defence.
Important block from the Guadalajara defence as Angel Sepulveda fires in a strike for Queretaro.
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to Queretaro.
Alexis Vega (Guadalajara) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a throw-in for Guadalajara, close to Queretaro's area.
In the minute 66, Victor Vucetich is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Akron with Jose Vazquez replacing Fernando Beltran.
Victor Vucetich (Guadalajara) is making a third substitution, with Jesus Angulo replacing Uriel Antuna.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto waits before resuming play because Angel Sepulveda for Queretaro is still down.
In the minute 69, Angel Sepulveda is back on his feet again.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Guadalajara in the half of Queretaro.
He's off! Hugo Silveira is shown a red card.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Zapopan to check on Jesus Molina, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 73, Jesus Molina has recovered and rejoins the match in Zapopan.
Ball safe as Queretaro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Guadalajara push forward at Estadio Akron and Jose Macias gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Queretaro defence.
In the minute 77, Queretaro will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Guadalajara.
Guadalajara are coming forward and Jose Macias gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio Akron.
In the minute 78, It's a goal kick for the away team in Zapopan.
It seems as if Angel Sepulveda is unable to continue. Sebastian Sosa replaces him for the away team.
Throw-in Queretaro.
In the minute 81, Gil Alcala is booked for the away team.
Oribe Peralta is on a sub for Jose Maduena for Guadalajara.
In the minute 82, Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The home team has substituted Jesus Molina with Eduardo Lopez. Victor Vucetich is thus making his fifth change.
Throw-in for Queretaro at Estadio Akron.
In the minute 84, Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a Queretaro throw-in in Guadalajara's half.
Guadalajara's Cristian Calderon breaks free at Estadio Akron. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Queretaro have a goal kick.
In the minute 85, The away team have replaced Alfonso Luna with Martin Rea. This is the third substitution made today by Alex Diego.
Julio Nava is replacing Erik Vera for Queretaro at Estadio Akron.
Guadalajara pushes forward through Oribe Peralta, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Queretaro in their own half.
Guadalajara have been awarded a penalty...
A massive blow for Guadalajara as Jose Macias misses from the spot.
Guadalajara's Alexis Vega misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Queretaro at Estadio Akron.
Queretaro have been awarded a corner by Eduardo Galvan Basulto.
The fourth official's board shows 6 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Eduardo Lopez (Guadalajara) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ball goes out of play for a Queretaro goal kick.
Eduardo Galvan Basulto signals a free kick to Queretaro in their own half.
Queretaro push upfield but Eduardo Galvan Basulto quickly pulls them for offside.
The match has come to a close in Zapopan. The final score is 1-1.
